title: How to do wudu? Can you suggest any beneficial videos or references? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: can you tell us how to perform wudu according to the sunnah this would take a lot of time munir there are many many videos on youtube that you can follow i think sheikh muhammad salah dr muhammad allah has done one i believe that many trusted scholars have done so you can go through it you can go through islam q a dot info they will give you the precise hadith the authentic hadith of the description that would tell you how to do it
